error.signature: Error: You are attempting to export 'metadata' from a component marked with 'use client'

verdict.summary: Next.js metadata export (for SEO) is only supported in Server Components, not Client Components.

dead_ends.why_fails: Loses SEO benefits; meta tags aren't set during SSR
May break if the component uses hooks or browser APIs

workarounds.action: Export metadata from a Server Component (layout.tsx or page.tsx without 'use client')
workarounds.how: Keep metadata in the page/layout, keep interactive parts in child Client Components

workarounds.action: Use generateMetadata() function for dynamic metadata based on params
workarounds.how: export async function generateMetadata({ params }) { return { title: ... } }

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Error' indicates exporting metadata from a 'use client' component, while 'Module not found' indicates a Node.js module imported in a client component.
